extendedInfo.description: Add extra to security to your phone if it is lost or stolen. Track its location and take pictures on the internet through the Anti Droid Theft website at www.antidroidtheft.com.  Its features include:- View position of phone using GPS- Track changes to SIM card / phone numbers- Spy camera, view pictures taken from phone's camera.Anti Droid Theft is one of the oldest and most popular anti theft apps used to secure your phone by using GPS tracking and other security features.  I created it when my previous smart phone was stolen, with the hope that if it ever happened again I could always track my phone to find out where it was.  Many people have since used it to find their lost or stolen phones.Another use that many people have been using Anti Droid Theft for is child tracking, keeping tabs on their children should the need ever arise.I hope to continue to release new versions of Anti Droid Theft that will offer more and more features to help defend against theft.Message from a user:"Thanks for such an awesome app, accidentally left my phone in pocket whilst skydiving, a highly educated guess is that it fell out of pocket at 1000 feet and somehow survived (muddy field after heave rain!) but could have landed anywhere your app made it very easy to find. Loosing my data would have been very inconvenient. Thank you so much"

reviews.title: Top one and best Antitheft application
reviews.comment: 100% Working accurate location. Simple, easy, n light. Wonderfull. Need hide application icon & administrator password protection at the time of uninstall...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Been in recovery mode for 12 hours. Will not show any data on tracking site. Tried wifi, gps, and 4g. Does nothing. Galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Website didn\'t work
reviews.comment: I could hear it taking photos from my phone on test run, although website never showed any details. Only when it was last updated which stopped after a while
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fails on galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: Wasn\'t able to track my galaxy nexus, even with a working connection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Total waste of time I lost my phone and got on the website and signed in it said 10 minutes for the camera and 5-30 for the location and it did nothin
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is crap
reviews.comment: 4 hours later, it didn\'t have a location or picture for my LG Thrill 3D.  My mom, 2500 miles away, found my phone!  (Uninstall).  Installed Where\'s My Droid, which worked on the test runs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Application may be useful, but after installation tried to uninstall and it uninstalled like a normal app. So can\'t it be done by a thief ? Not reliab
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Tested the app, activated tracking, 24 hours later the phone still hasn\'t reported its position nor snapped a picture. Ensured the entire time GPS, Wireless and 3G connectivity was all active. Uninstalled this and instead am using Where\'s My Droid which reported the phone\'s position within 5 minutes of a test.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but could be great!
reviews.comment: Needs password protect to uninstall app or make app hidden. But works how it says! Please put password or make hidden please! -Thunderbolt-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Smart app, but needs to be password protected so you can\'t uninstall without password. Other than that it is good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is one of the most wonderful apps I\'ve ever seen. You just need to give more options e.g. gps is used very frequently n consumes more battery.WD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works like a charm! Found my phone with ease! Thank god for this app! -- Droid X --
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Ace
reviews.comment: I love this app!! If you lost your phone or its been stolen all you have to do is sign into your online account to track it down :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I am so grateful for this app. I just lost my Droid & panicked because I just left school... it did everything it claimed to do & found my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: Trusted that this app would work. Then when I actually needed it, it didnt work at all. Provided zero info - just kept refreshing. Luckily found my phone by other means.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nope. Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: This worked when I had my HTC Desire, but not on my Samsung Galaxy. Waste of drive space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Well I tried it out by activating it and it gave me the wrong location...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Would be 5 stars...
reviews.comment: A little slow when getting updates, also falls into the trap of being worthless should the phone not have mobile data/wifi turned on, maybe this should be a new feature (turn them on if they\'re disabled)? Also, it doesn\'t show anything for the latest phone number.  Very well done though, it works very well! Hopefully I never have to use it :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a joke. Not hidden and can be uninstalled without password. What\'s the point?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wonderful app I can see exe My phone location - Praveen
reviews.author: A Google User
